idea-plugin.name: GfmA
idea-plugin.description:
Yet another Github Flavored Markdown Preview plugin for intellij platform

Feature

  • Preview markdown as github flavored markdown by Github Markdown API.
  • Using embedded Chromium browser to display preview.
  • If internet connection is not available, it falls back to offline markdown parser instead.
    • You may choose offline parser as default markdown parser.
    • Note that flexmark-java is used as offline markdown parser, but not every gfm syntax is parsed with the parser at this time.
      If you want to see precise gfm preview, I recommend to use Github Markdown API parser instead.
